name: Amazing Ninja Run
description:
Amazing Ninja Run is an addicting runner game. In Amazing Ninja Run navigate the Ninja through the perilous path, over the tunnel, inside the barred area running away from the spider.

In this game your ninja is an exceptional free runner. Run, jump, climb, slide, shoot as fast as you can . In this game parkour the ninja has to move fast and shoot incoming bugs and rolling drums.
Ninja runs through various scenes of tunnel and perilious path but beware of mountain stone falling from above.

Help ninja escape from the monster spider running after him.
Game controls
• Swipe to switch the left and right coordination.
• Drag back to slide.
• Drag up to jump.
• Tap to shoot.

Game features:
• Ninja runner game.
• Amazing 3D background.
• Excellent game controls.
• Run through perilious path and parkour.
• Shoot the spiders.
Take a deep breath and start running in Amazing Ninja Run for fun!
